title: After Hours AM: Conspiracies Declassified with Brian Dunning
content: In an illuminating and edifying edition of After Hours AM/America’s Most Haunted Radio — scintillating paranormal talk with hosts Joel Sturgis, Eric Olsen, and Heidi Hollis — we talk with Brian Dunning, Skeptoid podcaster and author of Conspiracies Declassified about the truth behind dozens of the strangest and most prevalent conspiracy theories buzzing around in the fevered minds of adherents worldwide. We talk with Brian at Joel, Eric, and Heidi discuss the latest paranor
